activities:
We are a hosting company, as such we will store contact information and financial records to facilitate our interaction with our clients.

In addition, our clients may store information related to their clients.  However, in most situations we have zero influence or control over what our clients do within the framework or services we provide.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client and Customer data that is both automatically and manually processed.
recoursemech:
